嗢字的基本解释

嗢
wà
吞咽。
笑。

嗢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wà］
［《廣韻》烏八切，入黠，影。］
(1)吞咽。参见“嗢咽”。
(2)吐出。参见“嗢噦”。
(3)笑。参见“嗢呼”、“嗢噱”。
(4)见“嗢咿”。
(5)通“温”。温暖。参见“嗢噦”。
[②]［wò］
［《廣韻》烏没切，入没，影。］
(1)见“噎嗢”。
(2)见“咽3嗢”。

嗢字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗢； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页203第28
【玉篇】乙骨切【唐韻】烏沒切，?音搵。【說文】咽也。【潘岳·笙賦】援鳴笙而將吹，先嗢噦以理氣。【註】咽中先噦而理氣也。一曰嗢噦，吐飮之貌。　又【廣韻】複姓，後魏書有嗢盆氏。又三字姓，嗢石蘭氏。　又【集韻】烏八切，音穵。義同。嗢字从口?聲。

考證：〔【潘岳·笙賦】先嗢噦而理氣。〕　謹照原文而改以。
嗢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嗢字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Increase
wà
Swallow.
laugh.
Increase
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wà］
["Guangyun" black eight cut, into the point, shadow. ]
(1) Swallowing. See "swallowing".
(2) Spit out. See also "zoom".
(3) Laugh. See also "嗢嗢", "嗢嗢".
(4) See "嗢咿".
(5) Through "Wen". warm. See also "zoom".
[②]［wò］
["Guangyun" Wu did not cut, enter, and shadow. ]
(1) See "Choke".
(2) See "Pharynx 3 嗢".
Increase
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　嗢; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 203 28
[Jade articles] Yi bone cut [Tang Yun] Wu did not cut,? Yin 搵. [Said the text] Pharyngeal also. [Pan Yue·Sheng Fu] To aid the sound of the sheng and blow, first increase the qi to regulate the qi. [Note] First choke in the pharynx and regulate the qi. One said the appearance of growing and vomiting.　[Guangyun] The surname was restored, and the later Wei Shu had the Jiapen clan. Another three-character surname, the Shilan clan.　[Jiyun] Wu eight cut, sound 穵. The same meaning. Increase the word from the mouth. Textual research: [[Pan Yue·Sheng Fu] First increase and regulate the qi. 〕　I would like to change it based on the original text.
